sn12.3:1: Sāvatthiyaṁ vihārati … pe … "micchāpaṭipadāñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sammāpaṭipadāñca. Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī"ti.
sn12.3:2: "Katamā ca, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipadā? Avijjāpaccayā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā; saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ … pe … evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipadā.
sn12.3:3: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāpaṭipadā? Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho; saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho … pe … evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sammāpaṭipadā"ti.
